page.title: 14ELEGANT HOUSING,PENARTH.
page.content: Overlooking the{Bristol Channel}is an area of fine{Victorian architecture, {Marine Parade,known as"Millionaires Row."This row of elegant houses,built originally for{wealthy ship and mill {owners}as trade was booming at Cardiff Docks.As life_styles have changed,many houses have been converted to flats,or homes for the elderly,and stables and coach_houses,now desirable residences. Some buildings are of grey limestone, others of red,yellow,or white brick. Window surrounds are of Bathstone.Roof and pediments are well decorated.Stone lions gaze proudly at{passers_by.Port_ {land Close,a recent award winning {housing development}is built in the grounds of a former house. "Asbestos slate roofs match the dark slate of buildings nearby,and yellow facing bricks reflect the string courses of neighbouring stone houses"_Architects.
